sentences.en: Annotate your photos with your own text.
sentences.cn: 注释您的照片与您自己的文字.

sentences.en: Annotate: Customer can annotate and buy the function based on different model.
sentences.cn: 注: 客户可根据不同型号选购所需要的功能配置.

sentences.en: Create and format a calendar for any month. Add shapes to annotate the calendar.
sentences.cn: 创建任一月份的日历,并为其规定格式. 添加形状,为日历添加批注.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page to annotate the Relationship shape.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页后,可以给关系形状加批注.

sentences.en: However, I knew I needed my own book to annotate.
sentences.cn: 可是我知道我需要自己拥有来做笔记.

sentences.en: I began to take possession of books and to annotate them.
sentences.cn: 我开始藏书,并给它们加上注释.

sentences.en: Its key purpose is to annotate spiritualism life philosophically.
sentences.cn: 对灵性生命和精神生命的哲学化注释,是其重要的使命.

sentences.en: Likewise directories themselves you should be able to annotate.
sentences.cn: 同样地目录他们自己你应该可以注解.

sentences.en: Our stone could annotate the fashion and exclusivity perfectly through its high quality.
sentences.cn: 我们产品品质上乘,能完美地诠释出时尚与奢华.

sentences.en: People annotate the history, so does the history annotate people.
sentences.cn: 人们在注释历史, 历史也在注释人们.

sentences.en: Some people annotate as they read.
sentences.cn: 有的人一面读书一面做注解.

sentences.en: The text expounds that AutoCADR 13 achieves diversified chinese character annotate meth - ods.
sentences.cn: 本文阐述了AutoCADR13版下实现多种汉字标注的基本原理及实现方法.

sentences.en: To crush the sham of life with gun To annotate the essence of life with friendship!
sentences.cn: 公平竞技,拒绝作弊.用枪枝粉碎生活中的虚伪,用友情诠释生命中的真谛!

sentences.en: Tracking text is used to annotate the Relationship shape.
sentences.cn: 跟踪文本用于给关系形状加批注.

sentences.en: You can use comment shapes to annotate class diagrams.
sentences.cn: 您可以使用注释形状来批注类关系图.

trans.tran_en: to add short notes to a book or piece of writing to explain parts of it
